Top Trove Foundation has benefited over 50,000+ people in India. We use cutting-edge technologies and digital goods to have a large-scale influence on society.We are now on a mission to transform India's nonprofit ecosystem by establishing Non-Profit. Initiatives that will give worth to millions of people who need resources and help.We are hiring HUMAN RESOURCE INTERNS, join us today and be a part of this wonderful project. *THIS IS AN UNPAID INTERNSHIP* *Selected intern's responsibilities* - 1. Hiring Interns for different positions. 2. Updating the information of hired candidates. 3. Screening resumes and taking interviews. 4. Post, update, and remove job ads from job boards, careers pages, and social networks 5. Address the intern's queries. 6.
